examples: The two men greeted one another warmly.
You must be there to greet your guests. My parents were waiting to greet us at the door.
The president rose to greet his guests.
She greeted him with a quick kiss.
The head teacher greeted all the pupils by name.

meanings.meaning: react to sth in particular way

examples: The announcement was greeted angrily by the workers.
The news was greeted with astonishment.
